title: Can Anything Stop GTA V? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.08.19
description:
Get started with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today right now while supplies last by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com. 

Will Grand Theft Auto V ever catch Tetris and Minecraft? Tim and Greg discuss!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:32 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mathew, Carolina, Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Mascaped and Hims, but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:26 - Can Anything Stop GTA V?
00:17:03 - Death Stranding Coming to Steam AND EGS Summer 2020
00:19:31 - “Is Playstation wasting their marketing money?” - Mizukey
00:25:11 - EA HASN’T Abandoned the Skate Trademark
00:31:44 - 2K Exec Disappointed with WWE 2K20
00:33:40 - The Outer Worlds Sales Are Good!
00:34:25 - PlayStation Opening Development Studio in Malaysia
00:36:03 - Out Today
00:42:17 -  Hims
00:43:39 - Manscaped
Reader mail   -
00:48:38 - “What do you think we can expect from XO19?” - Michael Gulliver
00:52:20 - “Yesterday Beat Saber released new soundtracks…” - Lawn Biologist
00:53:36 - “Jarvis Khattri has received a lifetime ban from Fortnite…” - RITA
01:00:05 - Squad Up: Hideindoors - Extra Life - tinyurl.com/KindaNYC2019
01:01:04 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Snowbike Mike
Tuesday - Greg & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Ash Paulsen
Friday - Greg & Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
